mapper.select: SELECT @rownum := @rownum + 1 AS rn, userid, f.cont f_cont, f.fare f_fare, amount, p.cont p_area, p.fare p_fare, (f.fare * amount) + p.fare total_fare, booking_date, reg_date from reservation r, parking_code p, fare_type f, (SELECT @rownum := 0) AS rn2 WHERE r.userid = #{userid} AND r.parking_area = p.code AND f.CODE = r.faretype order by rn;
mapper.insert: insert into reservation (userid, faretype, amount, parking_area, booking_date) values(#{userid}, #{faretype}, #{amount}, #{parking_area}, #{booking_date})
mapper.update: update reservation set faretype = #{faretype}, amount = #{amount}, parking_area = #{parking_area}, booking_date = #{booking_date} where idx = #{idx}
